original_text: and for his allowance, a regular allowance was given him by the king, according to his daily needs, until the day of his death, as long as he lived.
korean_text: 그가 날마다 쓸 것을 바벨론의 왕에게서 받는 정량이 있었고 죽는 날까지 곧 종신토록 받았더라

sentences.original_text: and for his allowance, a regular allowance was given him by the king
until the day of his death
